title: Formula 1 2020: Williams aim for 'fresh start' after launching new car
description: Williams aim to rebuild and return to competitiveness, according to deputy team boss Claire Williams, after launching their new car before the 2020 Formula 1 season.

title: Sam Hidalgo-Clyne: Exeter Chiefs sign Scotland scrum-half from Lyon
description: Scotland scrum-half Sam Hidalgo-Clyne agrees a move to Premiership leaders Exeter from French side Lyon.

title: Moussa Marega: Is football losing the fight against racism?
description: Malian international Moussa Marega became the first top level player to walk off the pitch after receiving abuse, in the latest of many recent incidents in matches across Europe. Clubs and football authorities in various countries are struggling to dealâ€¦

title: Solis: Pakistan music festival cancelled as hundreds storm venue
description: Female attendees allege instances of assault and harassment during the chaos at the event in Pakistan.

title: Elton John has walking pneumonia, cuts concert short
description: Pop music icon Elton John cut short his New Zealand concert Sunday because he is suffering from walking pneumonia.

title: 'Sonic' tops the North American box office with $57M
description: Family film "Sonic the Hedgehog" is the No. 1 movie in North America, earning $57 million in receipts this weekend, BoxOfficeMojo.com announced Sunday.

title: Jennifer Hudson wraps Aretha Franklin biopic 'Respect'
description: Oscar-winning "Dreamgirls" star Jennifer Hudson announced on Instagram that she has finished work on the Aretha Franklin biopic, "Respect."

title: Indiana Jones 5 is going to finally start shooting in "two months"
description: Harrison Ford will try "not to look silly".
